title: Chow Truck - Food Truck
typeOfFood: Lacto, American, Fast food, Asian, Fusion, Take-out only, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Food truck in Salt Lake City serving Asian cuisine. Menu consists of tacos, sliders, and salads--all of which have a fried tofu option. Tofu is vegetarian but can be veganized by asking for no breading. Asian spiced root chips are also vegan. Check its webpage for location & time. Buns for sliders contain dairy, reported Apr 2015.
